module.name: LazUtilities
module.short: Contains miscellaneous utility routines and variables used in the Lazarus IDE and LCL.

descr.p: This file is part of the LazUtils package.

element.name: FreeThenNil
element.short: Ensures that the specified object instance is freed and set to Nil.
element.descr: FreeThenNil is a procedure used to ensure that the object instance in obj is freed and set to Nil. If obj has been assigned, it is cast to a TObject instance and its Free method is called. Finally, the pointer to the address in obj is set to Nil.

element.name: FreeThenNil.obj
element.short: Object instance modified in the routine.

element.name: ComparePointers
element.short: Gets the relative order for the specified Pointers.

descr.p: ComparePointers is an Integer function used to get the relative order for the specified Pointer values. The following return values are used in the routine:

element.name: ComparePointers.Result
element.short: Numeric value with the relative order for the compared Pointers.

element.name: ComparePointers.p1
element.short: Pointer compared in the routine.

element.name: ComparePointers.p2
element.short: Pointer compared in the routine.

element.name: CompareBoolean
element.short: Compares the specified Boolean values.

dl.dd: Returned when b1 and b2 have the same value.
Returned as the default value (when b1 is False ).

element.name: CompareBoolean.Result
element.short: Numeric value for the comparison.

element.name: CompareBoolean.b1
element.short: Boolean value compared in the routine.

element.name: CompareBoolean.b2
element.short: Boolean value compared in the routine.

element.name: GetEnumValueDef
element.short: Gets the ordinal position for an enumeration value with the specified name.

descr.p: GetEnumValueDef is an Integer function used to get the ordinal position in the specified enumeration type insformation for the value with the given name.

The return value contains the ordinal position in TypeInfo for the enumeration value with the given Name. GetEnumValueDef calls GetEnumValue to find the value in Name in the type information. If the return value is -1, an enumeration value with the specified name is not found in TypeInfo and the value in DefaultValue is used as the return value.

element.name: GetEnumValueDef.Result
element.short: Ordinal position for the enumeration value with the specified name.

element.name: GetEnumValueDef.TypeInfo
element.short: Pointer to the type information examined in the routine.

element.name: GetEnumValueDef.Name
element.short: Name for the enumeration value to locate in TypeInfo.

element.name: GetEnumValueDef.DefaultValue
element.short: Default ordinal position for the enumeration value used when Name is not found.

element.name: RoundToInt
element.short: Rounds the specified Extended value to an Integer value.

descr.p: Calls Round to round the Extended value, and casts the result to the Integer type used as the return value.

element.name: RoundToInt.Result
element.short: Integer value for the rounded numeric value.

element.name: RoundToInt.e
element.short: Extended type rounded and converted in the routine.

element.name: RoundToCardinal
element.short: Rounds the specified Extended value to a Cardinal value.

descr.p: Calls Round to round the Extended value, and casts the result to the Cardinal type used as the return value.

element.name: RoundToCardinal.Result
element.short: Cardinal value for the rounded numeric value.

element.name: RoundToCardinal.e
element.short: Extended type rounded and converted in the routine.

element.name: TruncToInt
element.short: Truncates the extended value and returns an Integer type.

element.name: TruncToInt.Result
element.short: Integer type with the truncated value.

element.name: TruncToInt.e
element.short: Extended value truncated and converted in the routine.

element.name: TruncToCardinal
element.short: Truncates the extended value and returns a Cardinal type.

element.name: TruncToCardinal.Result
element.short: Cardinal type with the truncated value.

element.name: TruncToCardinal.e
element.short: Extended value truncated and converted in the routine.

element.name: StrToDouble
element.short: Converts the specified string value to a Double type.

descr.p: Calls StrToFloat to convert the value in s, and casts the result to the Double data type used as the return value.

element.name: StrToDouble.Result
element.short: Double type with the converted value.

element.name: StrToDouble.s
element.short: String value converted in the routine.

descr.p: ConsoleVerbosity is an Integer variable which indicates the level of detail output from tools like pas2js and CodeTools. ConsoleVerbosity enables debugger output for specific levels of detail.
